name: Devendra Banhart
description: '''Devendra Obi Banhart''' (born May 30, 1981) is an American singer-songwriter and visual artist. He was born in [[Texas]] and grew up in [[Venezuela]] and [[California]]. In 2000, he dropped out of the [[San Francisco Art Institute]] in [[San Francisco]] to pursue a musical career. In 2002, Banhart released his debut album and he is best known for his albums in the late 2000s such as ''[[Cripple Crow]]'' and ''[[Smokey Rolls Down Thunder Canyon]]''. He has since expanded his career to incorporate his interest and training in the visual arts.
